/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by buildings and trees on either side. Cars and buses, tiny from this height, traverse the road, adding to the dynamic energy of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
